Flights.name: Flights
Flights.description: Your team members will be able to see their flight details, airport information and booking references.

cards.text: Add your flight number and departure/arrival details.
Allocate seats to your team members, with full flexibility over booking type.
Premium users can access auto-filled flight data which automatically updates your flight information, just from the flight number!
Premium users can enable costings throughout their itinerary set-up.

Accommodation.name: Accommodation
Accommodation.description: Your team members will be able to see key information about their hotel stay, including check-ins and room types.

cards.text: Add your accommodation details, the location and contact information.
Allocate room bookings to your team members, with full flexibility over room types, booking types, and check in/out information.
Premium users can enable costings throughout their itinerary set-up.

HireCars.name: Hire Cars
HireCars.description: You can display all the information needed to collect and run a hire car, with pre-allocated drivers and passengers.

cards.text: Add your hire car bookings and all the key information.
Allocate drivers and passengers so your team know exactly where they are supposed to be.
Set custom aliases to your hire car bookings to easily keep track.
Premium users can enable costings throughout their itinerary set-up.

Activities.name: Activities
Activities.description: You can display all the information needed to collect and run a hire car, with pre-allocated drivers and passengers.

cards.text: Add your own custom activities to your itinerary.
Manage your slots quickly and easily from the event day.
Add any additional instructions to keep your team informed.
